Have a great festive break!

Hi Bahar,

You are very welcome!

Our team has completed the updates for you:
  • Quietform Panels Page: We have fixed the 3D design images so the profiles (Ribbed A and Ribbed B) are now displaying correctly.
  • 2026 Trends Report: We are ready to execute this update. Please send over the final PDF as soon as it is finalized later this week, and we will get that uploaded and live for Monday, December 29.

Regarding the Homepage Hero / Pop-up: To answer your question on what else is needed - if you decide to proceed with driving traffic via a hero image or pop-up, can you please provide us with the specific imagery and text copy you would like used for those banners?

Hi,
Done with the first request.

LMK when client send the PDF so we can replace the current one. Thanks.

@adriane @marcelo

(Time: 10min)

-Whil

Thank you for fixing the email.

I have two more requests if possible.
Firstly if you have a chance, can you fix the 3D design image on the page below:
Https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/quietform-panels/

Ribbed A is the large profile (wider gaps) and Ribbed B is the small profile (less gaps)

My second request is for replacing the current Lookbook download form this page with our 2026 Trends Report. We'd like this to remain gated content, using the same form structure so we capture full user details prior to download.
To maximise visibility and lead generation, we're considering driving traffic to this page via either a homepage hero image or a pop-up.
The Trends Report will be finalised later this week, and we'd like it hosted on our website from Monday 29 December, if possible.
Please let me know what do you need from us apart from the PDF..

Warm regards,

Bahar Sadr
Marketing Coordinator



T: +44 (0) 203 488 6322
Level 1 1 Old Street, London, EC1V 9HL, UK
acoufelt.com

action.text: Adriane Roa assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi Bahar,

I’m jumping in on behalf of Adriane.

After further investigation, we’ve identified the reason the files are still not downloading on your end.

Some of the installation guides and technical documents are currently linked to go.acoufelt.co.uk , while others are hosted under https://hub.acoufelt.com.

The issue is that files linked from go.acoufelt.co.uk  are not accessible for download within the current system, which is why the download options appear but the files themselves fail to download automatically.

What we’re doing now:
  • Updating all product pages so that any links pointing to go.acoufelt.co.uk  are replaced with hub.acoufelt.com  links so it will automatically download

This is a bulk update across multiple files and products, so it will take some time to complete, but please rest assured this is actively being worked on.

We appreciate your patience and will keep you updated on our progress.

Sorry just to add, I'm wondering if it would be possible to book a call if this is not resolved today?

Warm regards,

Bahar Sadr
Marketing Coordinator



T: +44 (0) 203 488 6322
Level 1 1 Old Street, London, EC1V 9HL, UK
acoufelt.com

📝 Ticket Summary: Recurring Technical Downloads Failure

Detail
Description
Subject
Technical Downloads and Request a Quote Button Not Working
Client
Bahar Sadr (Acoufelt)
Website
acoufelt.co.uk (All Product Pages)
Status
✅ Resolved

Issue Description

Bahar reported a recurring site-wide failure affecting all product pages on the UK website:
  1. Technical Downloads Failure: The technical documents were not loading for product pages (e.g., Woodbequiet Slats, Swing Ceiling Clouds).
  2. Request a Quote Button Failure: The main "Request a Quote" button/download option was also not working.

Resolution

Action Taken:
  • Support investigated the system-wide issue affecting the loading of both the download modal and the quote form modal.
  • The Fix: The underlying conflict or configuration error causing the modals (pop-ups) to fail to display their content was identified and corrected.
Outcome:
Both the technical downloads and the "Request a Quote" functionality are confirmed to be displaying and working correctly across all product pages.
(Time: 20mins)

Hi Bahar,

Thanks for reaching out to Wolf IQ Support!

We’ve taken a look into this and the issue should now be resolved. The technical downloads and “Request a Quote” pop-ups are displaying correctly across the product pages.

If there’s anything else you’d like us to check, we’re always happy to help.

📝 Ticket Summary: Website Errors and Content Updates on Acoufelt UK

Detail
Description
Subject
Multiple Technical and Content Errors on UK Site
Client
Bahar Sadr (Acoufelt)
Website
acoufelt.co.uk
Status
✅ Resolved

Summary of Actions

Support addressed and resolved all six reported issues across the Acoufelt UK website:
  1. Technical Downloads Issue:
    • Problem: Technical downloads were not appearing on the Full Colour Acoustic Wall Panels solution page.
    • Action: The display issue for downloads on the page was fixed.
  2. Product Links on Projects Page:
    • Problem: Specific product links (e.g., quiet form panels, framework ceiling grid) on the Projects page were not opening the relevant product pages.
    • Action: The product links on the Projects page were corrected.
  3. Phone Number Link Error (Top Menu):
    • Problem: The phone icon in the top menu was not linked to the correct UK phone number (020 3488 6322).
    • Action: The phone icon link was updated to the correct UK number.
  4. Mobile Page Failure:
    • Problem: The Acoustic Products page was not opening on mobile phones.
    • Action: The page loading issue was fixed, and the page should now open correctly on mobile devices.
  5. People Page Server Error:
    • Problem: The "People" page (under the Company tab) was throwing a 500 server error.
    • Action: The 500 error on the People page was resolved.
  6. Spelling Error:
    • Problem: Colleague Reilly Beaumont-Orr's name was misspelled on the website.
    • Action: The spelling of Reilly Beaumont-Orr's name was corrected.

Most of these errors seem to be related to the cloudflare outage - all good ✅
(Time: 15mins)

Hi Bahar,

Thanks for your note! These items should now be fixed: downloads, product links, phone number, mobile page, People page, and Reilly’s name.

Let me know if anything else comes up - happy to help!

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Adriane Roa

The people page from the company tab doesn't open unfortunately. I'm getting 500 server error.

Also, my colleague Reilly Beaumont-Orr 's name is misspelled on the website.
